vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for a private school on property within an R-7.5(A) Single Family District, on the south corner of Easton Road and East Lake Highlands Drive
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a two-year period with eligibility for automatic renewals for additional two-year periods, subject to a site plan, a traffic management plan, and conditions 
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a two-year period with eligibility for automatic renewals for additional two-year periods, subject to a site plan, a traffic management plan, and conditions
Z223-207(AU)
